headerDisplay: This plugin integrates your Shelly 3EM energy meters into HomeKit. Each device will appear as a separate child bridge.
footerDisplay: For more information and advanced settings, please refer to the plugin documentation.

devices.title: Configured Devices
devices.description: Add each Shelly 3EM energy meter you want to connect to HomeKit. You can add as many as you need.

name.title: Device Name
name.description: A user-friendly name for this device in HomeKit.

ip.title: IP Address
ip.description: The static IP address of the Shelly 3EM.

showPerPhaseSensors.title: Show Individual Phase Sensors
showPerPhaseSensors.description: Enable this to expose separate sensors for each of the three phases (A, B, C).

showTotalSensor.title: Show Total Energy Sensor
showTotalSensor.description: Enable this to expose a single sensor for the total energy consumption.

updateInterval.title: Polling Interval (ms)
updateInterval.description: The frequency in milliseconds at which the plugin will poll the Shelly 3EM for updated data. A lower value provides faster updates but may increase network traffic.
